description: This file defines a React functional component named DeviceForm for creating or editing network devices. It includes client-side validation, form handling, and interactions with external API functions for device management.

methods.name: DeviceForm
methods.description: React component for creating or editing devices with form validation and API interactions.

methods.name: setField
methods.description: Updates a specific form field in the component's state.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates form inputs, particularly for required fields and IP address format.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs validation, calls API, and manages success/error handling.
